net.sf.microlog.appender
Class RecordStoreAppender

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.microlog.appender.AbstractAppender
      net.sf.microlog.appender.RecordStoreAppender
All Implemented Interfaces:
Appender
public class RecordStoreAppender
extends AbstractAppender

An Appender that appends the logging to the record store.

The maximum log entry size can be set with the parameter microlog.appender.RecordStoreAppender.maxLogEntries The file name can be passed with the property microlog.appender.RecordStoreAppender.recordStoreName.

Since:
0.1
Author:
Johan Karlsson, Darius Katz, Karsten Ohme

Constructor Detail

RecordStoreAppender

public RecordStoreAppender()
Create a RecordStoreAppender with the default name and limited record size, i.e. "LogRecordStore" and 20 if not set to other values.

clearLog

public void clearLog()
Clear the underlying RecordStore from data. Note if logging is done when executing this method, these new logging events are not cleared.

Specified by:

Specified by:

configure

public void configure(PropertiesGetter properties)
Configure the RecordStoreAppender.

The maximum log entry size can be set with the parameter microlog.appender.RecordStoreAppender.maxLogEntries The file name can be passed with the property microlog.appender.RecordStoreAppender.recordStoreName.

Parameters:
properties - Properties to configure with
